title: Does the Gemstone bundle contain gemstones? [RESOLVED]
body:
You do get gemstones from this, up to 3 for buying each bundle, 1 per bundle. Apparently there's a Rito glitch in the system:
https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/7jc8se/psa_the_gemstone_bundles_are_deceptive/

replies.body: Those bundles **DO** give out a gemstone for each bundle. If you or someone you know didn't get the gem from those bundles please reach out to us in a ticket!!
